questions.question: What are the possible effects of climate change on plant and animal species?

choices.answer: Alteration of the species composition of biomes

questions.question: Intense rain leads to excess nutrient discharge in our oceans. High nutrient concentrations:

choices.answer: Cause eutrophication (algae blooms) & low oxygen zones
Are washed away before having an effect on the environment

questions.question: How can plants & animals cope as the climate changes?

choices.answer: Species sweat more to keep cool
Species shift their range to cooler, higher elevations
Species shift their range closer to the equator
Species don't need to cope; they are thriving!

questions.question: Which of these animals are declining in number & facing extinction from climate change?

imageMetadata.resources: Photo courtesy of Carbon Brief | Rosamund Pearce, based on data from Urban ( 2015): https://www.carbonbrief.org/climate-change-threatens-one-in-six-species-with-extinction-study-finds

questions.question: Changing seasonal patterns, such as shorter, milder winters, are causing:

choices.answer: Decline of pests due to freezing winter conditions

questions.question: Why are forests important for mitigating climate change?

choices.answer: Forests serve as a sink in the carbon cycle
Trees are an important food source
Leaves of trees reflect all sunlight away from the Earth

questions.question: Climate change is threatening the health of forests because of increases in:
Dying trees are an issue in relation to climate change because:

choices.answer: Children will have nothing to climb
Dead trees can fall on people's houses
Healthy forests are effective carbon sinks
Healthy forests are home to a diversity of animal species

questions.question: All the of following are ways scientists study climate change effects on ecosystems except:

choices.answer: They stalk one indicator species to observe their behavior
They use satellite & other remote observing system data
They observe & record shifting habitats as warming occurs
They run models using real data gathered by other scientists

questions.question: Which of the following forms of management is most effective for ecological diversity?

choices.answer: Protecting individual species across the world
Protecting areas that are economically beneficial to people
